content: I would like the HAPI experts to please chime in on this Bulk data export experience https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179250-bulk-data/topic/Size.20limit and let me know if this is a bug or am I doing something wrong. Thanks in advance.

That certainly sounds like a bug, but it's hard to be certain. Certainly bulk export should be able to export all resources, not just 200 of them.

Bulk export has had a lot of work in recent versions. I'd recommend trying it on the latest GA version, or even the latest snapshot builds.
